attributes.action: to recognise that the Mother earth is crying and take action
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Search for the the image of Mother Earth crying by entering Picture of Gaia crying in ice and recognise that the gods are unhappy with our overheated unbalanced lifestyles

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action. We do not accept words such as 'recognise' or 'accept' as a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
